casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Kirk Jacob HAYS, Petitioner No. 125 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 24, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, is:

Should Birchfield v. North Dakota apply to all cases not yet final when the decision was rendered?
